projects.title: BurnPlan
projects.description: Course project that calculates fire risk using prescribed burning rules and live weather data.
highlights: Rule-based risk scoring aligned with Tennessee procedures
Comprehensive unit and system tests (100% coverage)
Collaborative workflow using GitLab with issue tracking

projects.title: CryptoApp
projects.description: A desktop application for tracking cryptocurrency prices, alerts, and portfolio performance.
highlights: Historical price charts and lightweight visualizations
Custom price alerts and local notifications
Persistent portfolio storage with MySQL and profile support
Tested with unit and integration tests

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: My public portfolio and resume, a static site showcasing projects and technical writeups.
highlights: Responsive layout and simple static hosting
Data-driven AI section that renders projects from JSON
Accessible markup and lightweight JS with no build step
